original_text: Then I saw a great white throne and him who was seated on it. The earth and the heavens fled from his presence, and there was no place for them.
korean_text: 또 내가 크고 흰 보좌와 그 위에 앉으신 이를 보니 땅과 하늘이 그 앞에서 피하여 간 데 없더라

sentences.original_text: Then I saw a great white throne
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 내가 크고 흰 보좌를 보았고

sentences.original_text: and him who was seated on it
and there was no place for them
